wikipedia_page.main: Saul Shotton (born 10 November 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for AFC Telford United on loan from West Bromwich Albion.

response: His older brother, Liam, is also a footballer who played professionally in Singapore's S.League and in non-League football in England. His cousin Saul Shotton is also a footballer.
